comment.body: 这个厉害了，后面把资料卖给CNN，还能赚一笔。哈哈哈~

Benchmarking ZeroNet 0.6.0 (rev3171) Python 2.7.14 

CryptBitcoin:
- hdPrivatekey x 10..........0.082s [x8.55: Insane!!]
- sign x 10..........0.154s [x2.28: Fast]
- openssl verify x 100..........0.063s [x5.89: Insane!!]
- pure-python verify x 10..........0.115s [x13.90: Insane!!]

- sha256 5M x 10..........0.037s [x16.41: Insane!!]
- sha512 5M x 10..........0.091s [x6.59: Insane!!]
- os.urandom(256) x 1000..........0.006s [x1.10: OK]

Msgpack: (version: 0.4.8)
- pack 5K x 10 000..........0.022s [x36.07: Insane!!]
- unpack 5K x 10 000..........0.015s [x79.97: Insane!!]

Db: (version: 3.19.3, API: 2.6.0)

- Like query x 100..........0.287s [x6.27: Insane!!]

Compression:

- Zip unpack x 10..........0.045s [x4.42: Insane!!]
- Tar.gz pack x 10..........0.104s [x2.89: WOW]

- Tar.bz2 pack x 10..........0.850s [x2.35: Fast]

Done. Total: 3.31s
